summary: Provides a reusable mixin that supplies helper utilities and a suite of automated tests to verify the correctness of text generation pipelines in Flax models across various decoding strategies such as beam search, greedy decoding, and sampling, including handling of attention masks, logits warpers, and multiple return sequences.
business_intent: Enable reliable validation of Flax generation implementations during development and CI, ensuring that different decoding configurations produce expected outputs and maintain model quality.
